00012 int Course::normal_class_size() {
00013     int deptId = department_array[department_recno]->department_id;
00014 
00015     if ( teaching_method == DISTANCE_LEARN_COURSE )
00016         return department_res[deptId]->max_dl_class_size;
00017     else
00018         return course_res.get_normal_class_size(department_res[deptId]->template_course_type, teaching_method);
00019 }
